::DarkMouse::

She watched them walk by her.  She looked down at the ground and 
sighed. She said in almost a whipser,"Anybot with this running 
through them would have a better advantage in battle.  Death would 
not come so quickly and one could heal themselves in mimutes without 
the aid of a CR."  She turned slowly and walked back to Destructor.  
She didn't look at him, but walked past him and then stood behind 
him, still looking down. 



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Ramulus/Grimmler::
> 
> Ramulus raises an eyebrow plate, watching DarkMouse heal herself. 
He 
> had absolutely no idea what she meant to show by that...
> 
> Walking to stand near Mangus, Ramulus speaks up. "I have no problem 
> with peace. Maximals always welcomed peace with open arms before, 
but 
> it never lasted."
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Grimmler frowns, watching DarkMouse as he moves over to near Mangus.
